miniapp.name: LuckyDraw
miniapp.subtitle: Spin for numbers, answers, or a random pick.
miniapp.description: LuckyDraw is a tiny randomizer hub: roll a number, pull a yes/no/maybe, or pick a random item from your list.
miniapp.tagline: Spin for numbers, answers, or a random pick.
